name: Sherlock Jack
description:
It is I, Makurity, shape-shifting master of evil. I have battled Sherlock Jack through time and space. Now our conflict has led us to London. Ah hah hah hah!

Controls:

Arrows / DPad - move Sherlock Jack

Left Ctrl / Fire - swing Sherlock Jack's sword

(H - debugging cheat key to drink a vial of poppy extract)
